name: HomologicalComplex.extend.isZero_X
initialProofState:

C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C

name: HomologicalComplex.extend.d_eq
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
c : ComplexShape Œπ
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c
i j : Option Œπ
a b : Œπ
hi : Eq i (Option.some a)
hj : Eq j (Option.some b)
‚ä¢ Eq (HomologicalComplex.extend.d K i j) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.extend.XIso K hi).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.d a b) (HomologicalComplex.extend.XIso K hj).inv))
decl:
lemma d_eq {i j : Option Œπ} {a b : Œπ} (hi : i = some a) (hj : j = some b) :
    d K i j = (XIso K hi).hom ‚â´ K.d a b ‚â´ (XIso K hj).inv := by
  subst hi hj
  dsimp [XIso, d]
  erw [id_comp, comp_id]

name: HomologicalComplex.extend.XOpIso_hom_d_op_assoc
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
c : ComplexShape Œπ
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c
i j : Option Œπ
Z : Opposite C
h : Quiver.Hom { unop := HomologicalComplex.extend.X K j } Z
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.extend.XOpIso K i).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.extend.d K j i).op h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.extend.d K.op i j) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.extend.XOpIso K j).hom h))
decl:
@[reassoc]
lemma XOpIso_hom_d_op (i j : Option Œπ) :
    (XOpIso K i).hom ‚â´ (d K j i).op =
      d K.op i j ‚â´ (XOpIso K j).hom :=
  match i, j with
  | none, _ => by
      simp only [d_none_eq_zero, d_none_eq_zero', comp_zero, zero_comp, op_zero]
  | some i, some j => by
      dsimp [XOpIso]
      simp only [d_eq _ rfl rfl, Option.some.injEq, d_eq, op_comp, assoc,
        id_comp, comp_id]
      rfl
  | some _, none => by
      simp only [d_none_eq_zero, d_none_eq_zero', comp_zero, zero_comp, op_zero]

inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c
e : c.Embedding c'

‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.Limits.IsZero ((K.extend e).X i')
decl:
lemma isZero_extend_X' (i' : Œπ') (hi' : e.r i' = none) :
    IsZero ((K.extend e).X i') :=
  extend.isZero_X K hi'

name: HomologicalComplex.isZero_extend_X
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c
e : c.Embedding c'
i' : Œπ'
hi' : ‚àÄ (i : Œπ), Ne (e.f i) i'
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.Limits.IsZero ((K.extend e).X i')
decl:
lemma isZero_extend_X (i' : Œπ') (hi' : ‚àÄ i, e.f i ‚â† i') :
    IsZero ((K.extend e).X i') :=
  K.isZero_extend_X' e i' (by
    obtain hi'|‚ü®i, hi‚ü© := (e.r i').eq_none_or_eq_some
    ¬∑ exact hi'
    ¬∑ exfalso
      exact hi' _ (e.f_eq_of_r_eq_some hi))

‚ä¢ (K.extend e).IsStrictlySupported e

instance : (K.extend e).IsStrictlySupported e where

i j : Œπ

decl:
lemma extend_d_eq {i' j' : Œπ'} {i j : Œπ} (hi : e.f i = i') (hj : e.f j = j') :

name: HomologicalComplex.extend_d_from_eq_zero
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c
e : c.Embedding c'
i' j' : Œπ'
i : Œπ
hi : Eq (e.f i) i'
hi' : Not (c.Rel i (c.next i))
‚ä¢ Eq ((K.extend e).d i' j') 0
decl:
lemma extend_d_from_eq_zero (i' j' : Œπ') (i : Œπ) (hi : e.f i = i') (hi' : ¬¨ c.Rel i (c.next i)) :
    (K.extend e).d i' j' = 0 := by
  obtain hj'|‚ü®j, hj‚ü© := (e.r j').eq_none_or_eq_some
  ¬∑ exact extend.d_none_eq_zero' _ _ _ hj'
  ¬∑ rw [extend_d_eq K e hi (e.f_eq_of_r_eq_some hj), K.shape, zero_comp, comp_zero]
    intro hij
    obtain rfl := c.next_eq' hij
    exact hi' hij

e : c.Embedding c'
i' j' : Œπ'
j : Œπ
hj : Eq (e.f j) j'
hj' : Not (c.Rel (c.prev j) j)
‚ä¢ Eq ((K.extend e).d i' j') 0
decl:
lemma extend_d_to_eq_zero (i' j' : Œπ') (j : Œπ) (hj : e.f j = j') (hj' : ¬¨ c.Rel (c.prev j) j) :
    (K.extend e).d i' j' = 0 := by
  obtain hi'|‚ü®i, hi‚ü© := (e.r i').eq_none_or_eq_some
  ¬∑ exact extend.d_none_eq_zero _ _ _ hi'
  ¬∑ rw [extend_d_eq K e (e.f_eq_of_r_eq_some hi) hj, K.shape, zero_comp, comp_zero]
    intro hij
    obtain rfl := c.prev_eq' hij
    exact hj' hij

lemma extendMap_comp :

  ¬∑ obtain ‚ü®i, hi‚ü© := hi'

  have := (K.extendOpIso e).inv.comm i' j'
  dsimp at this
  rw [‚Üê this, ‚Üê comp_f_assoc, Iso.hom_inv_id, id_f, id_comp]

name: HomologicalComplex.extendMap_add
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
K L : HomologicalComplex C c
œÜ œÜ' : Quiver.Hom K L
e : c.Embedding c'
‚ä¢ Eq (HomologicalComplex.extendMap (HAdd.hAdd œÜ œÜ') e) (HAdd.hAdd (HomologicalComplex.extendMap œÜ e) (HomologicalComplex.extendMap œÜ' e))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma extendMap_add [Preadditive C] {K L : HomologicalComplex C c} (œÜ œÜ' : K ‚ü∂ L)
    (e : c.Embedding c') : extendMap (œÜ + œÜ' : K ‚ü∂ L) e = extendMap œÜ e + extendMap œÜ' e := by
  ext i'
  by_cases hi' : ‚àÉ i, e.f i = i'
  ¬∑ obtain ‚ü®i, hi‚ü© := hi'
    simp [extendMap_f _ e hi]
  ¬∑ apply (K.isZero_extend_X e i' (fun i hi => hi' ‚ü®i, hi‚ü©)).eq_of_src

name: ComplexShape.Embedding.extendFunctor_obj
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_1
Œπ' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
c' : ComplexShape Œπ'
e : c.Embedding c'
C : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroObject C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c
‚ä¢ Eq ((e.extendFunctor C).obj K) (K.extend e)
decl:
/-- Given an embedding `e : c.Embedding c'` of complex shapes, this is
the functor `HomologicalComplex C c ‚•§ HomologicalComplex C c'` which
extend complexes along `e`: the extended complexes are zero
in the degrees that are not in the image of `e.f`. -/
@[simps]
noncomputable def extendFunctor [HasZeroMorphisms C] :
    HomologicalComplex C c ‚•§ HomologicalComplex C c' where
  obj K := K.extend e
  map œÜ := HomologicalComplex.extendMap œÜ e

  obj K := K.extend e
  map œÜ := HomologicalComplex.extendMap œÜ e
